title: Action Comics - Redemption (847-849) [NVS-D]
description:
A Novus Release




This torrent includes the HD version.
  
 


*Note: You can download all or only choose which version you'd prefer by deselecting the one you don't want when you add the torrent to your client software. If you're adding the torrent via magnet link, you can deselect any undesired file in the list of files once the torrent has begun downloading.

========================================================




Gathers Action comics 847-849, titled "Redemption".



#847  In this companion issue to the "Last Son" storyline, Ma and Pa Kent discuss the disappearance of Superman during his battle with General Zod. Pa recalls an adventure he and Superman had years ago involving a trip they took together deep into space - and their frightening encounter with a Sun-Eater! 

#848  In part 1 of the 2-part "Redemption" storyline, Superman travels the world from the wilds of Colorado to the plains of Africa to battle an uncontrollable power who draws their energy from an unbelievable source! 

#849  In part 2 of the 2-part "Redemption" storyline, Superman is about to become mankind's doom! The real control behind the power Superman has been fighting is revealed, and Superman will need help from an unexpected place in order to stop this dangerous new threat! 






Thanks goes to the OkC.O.M.P.U.T.O for this release.
